reviews.author: Jeff Leboeuf
reviews.text: Need storage or a 15’ U Haul, this is the place. Amber S., the store manager is efficient, pleasant and quick. Great experience!

reviews.author: Michael Leclerc
reviews.text: Friendly service, clean units. The owner seems nice and the cashier was willing to work with me so I could maximize the usage of their promotion that they had going on.

reviews.author: Paul McCoy
reviews.text: Professional staff, brand new and clean storage units and Awesome hours!

reviews.author: Janene Aguilar
reviews.text: I have been with storage works for some time now and the staff has been great and very helpful and I feel very safe with my stuff there they are secure with cameras I want to thank them for helping me with all my storage needs

reviews.author: Patrick McManus
reviews.text: I’ve been with Storage Works for some time now and I have nothing but good to say about them. Billie and the others at the Vancouver Wa location have really helped me, as recently I was selling my home and needed a larger size unit than my current one to store my things. Well the sale fell through because of the recent issues affecting us all and as I didn’t need the larger unit they took my payments and rolled them into my smaller one that I already had, not charging me for 2 units as some other storage places might have. So again Storage Works has treated me with a high degree of kindness and consideration, very professional and always eager to help. Give them a chance, I think you will be pleasantly surprised. Thanks Storage Works.

reviews.author: Stephanie Ashmore
reviews.text: Storage works at Van Mall is great!  Staff is friendly, units are clean and well maintained.  The entry gates are fancy too.  Great deal on storage while I move. I highly recommend to anyone looking for storage space.

reviews.author: staci barbour
reviews.text: It’s a fantastic storage company. Next level customer service. I highly recommend storing your stuff there. Great experience so far!!!

reviews.author: Kara Hage
reviews.text: Storage Works is fantastic! Very secure and very clean! Pricing is amazing! Also their staff is awesome, especially Billie!! She is friendly, always smiling, and happy to help when she can! She totally makes that place better! :)

reviews.author: Scott Strickland
reviews.text: I needed a small unit in a hurry because of work being dona on our house. The reservation process was a breeze on their website. I reserved a unit for the next day and when that day came Kayla called to make sure it was not a mistake. When I drove to the site Kayla was very friendly and knows her business. She made the process easy and took the time to make sure the unit I reserved was actually what I was looking for. It is awesome working with them.

reviews.author: Brad Lucas
reviews.text: This was by far the best storage facility we have ever been to! Awesome staff, clean grounds, fair prices and secure facility. If we ever needed to this is probably the only storage place I use again. Never will I go back to public storage. The only drawback was we didn’t receive our referral bonus as we were told.

reviews.author: Scott Allen
reviews.text: Excellent Service. Great location, clean and neat. Feel very comfortable leaving my belongings there.

reviews.author: K Em
reviews.text: The young lady was very polite, and knowledgeable about her craft. Nice to see young people still possess awesome customer service skills... Left me impressed..

reviews.author: Penny Walker
reviews.text: This facility is very nice and clean, secure and spacious.  The management,Danielle and her husband are awesome.  Very helpful, incredibly friendly and considerate.  Pricing was competitive to local storage units .

reviews.author: Joseph Hulscher
reviews.text: This is one of the nicest facilities I have toured.   All units are convenient drive up units and the overall security is beyond any expectations.    This is a  local owned establishment so no having to deal with corporate entities.    Top Notch --
